name: InputReactor
description:
Input Reactor
A game where the input of YOU controls part of the level and reach the end. Beat your best time in every level. :)

This game was made as a school project focusing on the puzzle and level design.

Controls

  • Moving: WASD; Arrows Keys; L-Joystick
  • Jump: Space; A Button (South-Controller Button)
  • Sprint: L-Shift; X Button (West-Controller Button)
